Description of incident: The university is notifying nearly              800 students and alumni that some of their personal information may              have been on a stolen laptop. That laptop was taken from a professor's              home on July 5th after the home was burglarized. The laptop contained              class roster information  -  name, student ID number, e-mail address,              graduating class year and grade information  -  for current and              past UCCS students. No financial information was stored on the laptop,              but there is a possibility that Social Security numbers may have been              involved for students enrolled prior to summer, 2005.
